abstract: On Oct. 31, 1984, Indian Prime Minister Indira Gandhi was assassinated near her residence by two vengeance-seeking Sikh security guards.
snippet: On Oct. 31, 1984, Indian Prime Minister Indira Gandhi was assassinated near her residence by two vengeance-seeking Sikh security guards.

headline.main: Oct. 31, 1984 | Indian Prime Minister Indira Gandhi Assassinated
